_metadata.description: Core P0 functionality for seamless agent loop integration with zero-friction usage

requirements.title: Auto-Creation Shorthand Syntax
requirements.description: Support --location + --tag + --pattern flags that automatically create campaign if none exists matching location+tag pair, enabling zero-friction agent usage without manual campaign management

requirements.title: Campaign-Level Notes Storage
requirements.description: Store and retrieve free-form notes at campaign level for phase handoff context and global metadata (e.g., 'UX review complete. Focus areas for refactor: state management, performance')

requirements.title: File-Level Notes Storage
requirements.description: Store and retrieve notes on individual files to track intra-file work (e.g., 'Improved Getting Started section. Need a Nudge component still needs work')

requirements.title: Manual File Prioritization
requirements.description: Boost or demote individual files in staleness ranking via CLI commands (e.g., 'campaign prioritize <file> --weight 2.0' to increase priority)

requirements.title: Manual File Exclusion
requirements.description: Mark files as excluded from campaigns when they are exceptional or false positives (e.g., 'campaign exclude <file> --reason "Already exceptional"')

requirements.title: Smart Default Exclusions
requirements.description: Automatically exclude data/, tmp/, temp/, coverage/, dist/, out/, build/ directories by default (configurable via --include-all flag)

requirements.title: Campaign Size Limits
requirements.description: Default max files per campaign (e.g., 200) with --max-files override and helpful errors when exceeded (e.g., 'Pattern matches 437 files but limit is 200. Refine pattern or use --max-files')

requirements.title: Campaign Reset Command
requirements.description: Reset campaign visit history while preserving configuration via 'campaign reset' command for starting fresh analysis passes

requirements.title: Agent-Friendly Response Formats
requirements.description: Return structured, actionable responses optimized for agent parsing with clear file paths, staleness indicators, visit history, notes, and campaign progress statistics
